Class TextField

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.ntnu.imt3281.project1.BaseComponent

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class TextField
extends BaseComponent
    TextField class represents a definable JTextField object to be used in the GridBagLayout editor.
    Author:
    thomasgg, sadario
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
